    0.2

      GephiLayoutManager(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String tempFolderString)
      Set GraphML file names: graph (original graph), graph-layout (graph with layout), graph-layout-noatt (graph with layout but with no vertex and node attributes)

        Set GraphML file names: graph (original graph), graph-layout (graph with layout), graph-layout-noatt (graph with layout but with no vertex and node attributes)

      • doLayout

        public org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.tinkergraph.structure.TinkerGraph doLayout(org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.tinkergraph.structure.TinkerGraph tinkerGraph,
                                                                               org.gephi.io.importer.api.EdgeDirectionDefault edgeDirection)
                                                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                               javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                                               org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                                               javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Performs Fruchterman-Reingold layout for a TinkerGraph with Gephi. Write the results in the graph files specified in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        tinkerGraph - The TinkerPop graph
        edgeDirection - Edge direction -if null, it is set to EdgeDirectionDefault.DIRECTED
        Returns:
        TinkerGraph with layout positions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
